channel.title: CVE Feed for Avaya -- Product
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Avaya -- Product

item.title: CVE-2021-25656|2024-08-03T20:11:28.258Z -- avaya -- product
item.description: Stored XSS injection vulnerabilities were discovered in the Avaya Aura Experience Portal Web management which could allow an authenticated user to potentially disclose sensitive information. Affected versions include 7.0 through 7.2.3 (without hotfix) and 8.0.0 (without hotfix).
